title: so there was an event that happened not too long ago
body:
and in that event we got a new ARAM map for a short time.

now there is a new event happening, an event taking place in piltover that includes a bit of zaun and maby a zaun event later on.  any chance theres going to be a new map skin for this event aswell?

i deffinately want to see a Sun Gate map with sunken zaun in the foreground of one side and high rize piltover on the other

replies.body: Considering Riot statement that we won't get any lore event anymore i'd be willing to say no (Piltover feels like it is on a middle ground between Targon's Update and Burning Tides event); But, and this is a big "but", Riot has shown that it can still take us by surprise: with the presentation of ""meme"" skin like Baker Panth and Devil Teemo, the introduction of replays for your matches and the promise for the fabled sandbox mode in the future; nothing forbids us to wish that they might have made a slight turn-around regarding lore events, even if in a lesser way. Might just be a foolish hope, but Riot's latest behaviour got me in a good mood for hoping.
